1252380.name: Battle of Orion 10: First contact
1252380.description:
Coming to Early access this year!

Battle of Orion 10 is a third person, action RPG that takes place in the year 2575 when humanity discover that they are not alone in the universe.

The story

A hundred years have passed since the events on Cronos X transpired. The USN have not taken the warnings from Cronos to heed and is unprepared for the onslaught of the alien armada. Now, you must take point in fighting the brutal alien armada that is tearing through the outer rims and destroying the undefended human colonies.

Explore worlds

Fight enemies

Fly between star systems and fight enemy space-craft

Craft weapons, armor and upgrades

Evolve your character

Create your character


Four character classes
  • Warlock
  • Cyborg
  • Army veteran
  • Guardian

Four race classes
  • Centurion
  • Mercurian
  • Lunar / Earther
  • Venucian

Steam achievements

Earn Steam achievements as you advance through the game, solving missions and learning about Cronos.

The story

Humans have explored many star systems and made countless colonies in the bordering star systems. You have been in the service of the USN black ops for many decades (United Sol Nation) and has been sent to investigate an emergency signal sent by one of the colonies in the rim-worlds.
1252380.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
